attributes.title: Best friend gone physco
attributes.review:
THIS APP MADE MY BEST FRIEND GO PHYSCO:
My best friend was my best friend. She made me laugh all the time but thanks to this crusty old orange man she is insane. We downloaded this app as a joke, but things just kept getting worse... when we were having a sleepover we downloaded it and all of a sudden we see this crusty old orange man on our screen my best friend didnâ€™t think any of it at first but then...suddenly... she screamed a TERRIFYING scream!! She then looked at me straight in the eyeballs and said the terrifying words â€œ Iâ€™m going to kill you and thereâ€™s nothing you can do about itâ€ I ran away from her and she chased me around the bathroom, on top of my recliners, up the stairs, around the living room, and around my whole house. I just couldnâ€™t take it anymore so I hid in a big hole my brother dug and I called my sister to come pick me up. My best friend was searching for me until finally my sister pulled into the driveway and snatched me from the hole. We drove as fast as we could but the orange man gave my best friend the ability to run really fast. She jumped on top of the car and licked the car windows and said â€œtastyâ€ which she would never do because she hates germs. She then opened my door and started dancing, we were both doing the renagade and all of a sudden she touched me and I turned orange just like her. We then touched my sister and she turned orange as well. We started turning everything and everyone orange. My best friend and I started ruling the world. and as I am sitting on a throne with my best friend eating chocolate covered strawberries I am writing this. So if you donâ€™t want my best friend and I to come turn you orange DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP THANK YOU AND GOOD NIGHT.
